content: this pattern is for crocheted pull-on diaper soaker sacks these sacks make nighttime changing easier while your baby is a newborn instead of needing to pull a soaker down or deal with fastening wraps you simply lift the sack up from the bottom change baby s diaper then pull it back down over baby s legs keeping baby warm and the bed dry the sizes include preemie and nb/small it is crocheted in the round with worsted weight 100% wool yarn and features ribbing for the waistband at the bottom and an optional drawstring waist and bottom crochet sleepy soaker sack version a2 january 6 2007 this pattern was created using - 5 oz cascade 220 - a worsted weight 100% wool yarn 4 oz main color 1 oz trim or 5 oz for solid - g hook - h hook please check your gauge before starting gauge 8 row and 8 single_crochet = 2 with h hook size waist length weight preemie 10 - 15 5 10 up to 7 pounds nb/small 12 - 18 5 12 8 - 16 pounds body with h hook chain 54 60 join with slip_stitch in 1st
